name: Postpartum_ClinicalGroupingEvent
title: Postpartum_Clinical Grouping Event
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for the Postpartum_Clinical Grouping
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Postpartum_Clinical Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Postpartum_Clinical Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Postpartum_Clinical Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Postpartum_Clinical Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
